name: Super Extreme High School Love Detector
name_original: Super Extreme High School Love Detector
description:
Can you figure out who has a crush on you in...

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Interact/Continue

Backspace - Exit Dialogue

Escape - Quit

This was made for Ludum Dare 41 by Jess Foley (Art), Dylan Growcoot (Art/Story), Scott Harrand (Story/Writing), Daniel Hart (Programming) and Angelina Kelli (Art).
